name: Echo Motel & Oceanfront Cottages

reviews.text: This place is wonderful. We were in town for a quick weekend away. It was supposed to be a kid free weekend, but unfortunately our plans changed last minute. Leslie and Paul were very accommodating, moving us to a bigger room and even dealt with our late arrival with a friendly smile.
reviews.title: Diamond in the Rough

reviews.text: We stayed in room #9. We found it very clean and suited our needs just fine. The pool is great and even though we didn't take full advantage of it, being so close to the beach is a huge plus. You can tell that they take pride in the place. It is updated with nice trex decking and weather proof vinyl fencing - no worries about splinters in little feet here!
reviews.title: Simply outstanding!

reviews.text: We would love to return to the Echo next summer, maybe in a cottage next time!
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have just spent three days in awe from sunrise to sunset at the breathtaking views from the veranda of cottage Echo 3 set on a private beach overlooking the sea grass and public beach.
reviews.title: One of Old Orchard Beach's better places

reviews.text: The cottage, a home away from home, was just so bright, airy, warm, comfortable, spotless and provided all the amenities one could wish for.
reviews.title: The Best Place To Stay in Old Orchard

aka: Echo Motel & Oceanfront Cottages Hotel Old Orchard Beach
description: The Echo Motel & Cottages are centrally located and within walking distance to the pier. The Oceanfront Cottages are large with wraparound decks that offer incredible views of the beach and bay. Other cottages within feet of the ocean are also available. Clean and comfortable motel units with or without kitchenettes are located 50 feet from the ocean with no streets to cross. All accommodations are reasonably priced.
